level.text: Notice of hearing shall be published at least once in the D.C. Register.
Notice of a hearing shall be mailed first class by the Board to the following:
The affected Advisory Neighborhood Commission; and
All retail service stations within one (1) mile of the applicant’s retail service station.
Notice of hearing shall be provided at least thirty (30) days before the date of the hearing.
Notice of a hearing shall include the following:
A statement of the time and place of the hearing;
A general summary of the application under consideration;
The name of the applicant and the location of the applicant’s retail service station; and
A statement setting forth the requirements for participation in the hearing and the date by which those requirements must be filed.
